about_section.title: More Than a Marketplace: Our Mission
about_section.subtitle: We saw the daily hustle of street food vendors—the heart of our city's culture—and we knew there had to be a better way to connect them to quality ingredients.
about_section.empowerment_paragraph: FreshConnect is more than just a platform; it's a social initiative. We believe street food vendors are the unsung heroes of our culinary landscape—micro-entrepreneurs who serve our communities with passion. For too long, their growth has been limited by an opaque supply chain, inconsistent quality, and a lack of bargaining power. Our mission is to change that. We are dedicated to empowering these small business owners with the digital tools and transparent access they need to not just survive, but to thrive. By leveling the playing field, we help them secure fair prices, build reliable partnerships, and focus on what they do best: creating the delicious food that defines our streets. Their success is the true measure of ours.

transparency.title: Radical Transparency
transparency.desc: No more guesswork. We provide a clear platform to compare real-time prices from multiple verified suppliers, ensuring you always get a fair deal.

community.title: Community-Powered Growth
community.desc: Strength in numbers. Our group ordering feature allows vendors to band together, unlock bulk-rate discounts, and lower costs for everyone.

trust.title: Unwavering Trust
trust.desc: Your business depends on reliability. That's why every supplier on FreshConnect is rigorously verified for quality, licenses, and business integrity.

footer.about: Connecting street food vendors with trusted suppliers across India.
